title: Stolen
description:
TRAPPED ON THE DARK SIDE OF LOVE
Dylan Prescott has endured a life full of disappointments, rumors, and tears. Just as she begins to relax into her admittedly boring life, she's attacked.As her veil of normalcy is yanked away, she finds herself the target of multiple Soul Collecting Demons, all vying to capture and dominate her. Dylan quickly realizes that she's too naive to compete with these powerful, ancient creatures. But why her? What's so special about Dylan Prescott? And how is it possible that she has fallen helplessly in love with one of them?
author: S.M. Yair-Levy
